mapper.insert: insert into orders (o_id, o_type, o_handoverNo, o_goodsName, o_goodWeight, o_mailer, o_maileraddress, o_shassress, o_ordersta, o_maiphone, o_consignee, o_consigneephon, o_startingCity, r_midpoint, r_endCityId, o_shippingPrice, o_distributionPr, o_transporPr, o_totalPrnvar, o_vehicle, o_remarks ) values (#{oId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{oType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{oHandoverno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{oGoodsname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{oGoodweight,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{oMailer,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{oMaileraddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{oShassress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{oOrdersta,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{oMaiphone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{oConsignee,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{oConsigneephon,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{oStartingcity,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{rMidpoint,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{rEndcityid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{oShippingprice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{oDistributionpr,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{oTransporpr,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{oTotalprnvar,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{oVehicle,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{oRemarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
mapper.update: update orders set o_type = #{oType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, o_handoverNo = #{oHandoverno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, o_goodsName = #{oGoodsname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, o_goodWeight = #{oGoodweight,jdbcType=INTEGER}, o_mailer = #{oMailer,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, o_maileraddress = #{oMaileraddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, o_shassress = #{oShassress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, o_ordersta = #{oOrdersta,jdbcType=INTEGER}, o_maiphone = #{oMaiphone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, o_consignee = #{oConsignee,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, o_consigneephon = #{oConsigneephon,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, o_startingCity = #{oStartingcity,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, r_midpoint = #{rMidpoint,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, r_endCityId = #{rEndcityid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, o_shippingPrice = #{oShippingprice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, o_distributionPr = #{oDistributionpr,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, o_transporPr = #{oTransporpr,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, o_totalPrnvar = #{oTotalprnvar,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, o_vehicle = #{oVehicle,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, o_remarks = #{oRemarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where o_id = #{oId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select o_id, o_type, o_handoverNo, o_goodsName, o_goodWeight, o_mailer, o_maileraddress, o_shassress, o_ordersta, o_maiphone, o_consignee, o_consigneephon, o_startingCity, r_midpoint, r_endCityId, o_shippingPrice, o_distributionPr, o_transporPr, o_totalPrnvar, o_vehicle, o_remarks from orders where o_id = #{oId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

select o_id, o_type, o_handoverNo, o_goodsName, o_goodWeight, o_mailer, o_maileraddress, o_shassress, o_ordersta, o_maiphone, o_consignee, o_consigneephon, o_startingCity, r_midpoint, r_endCityId, o_shippingPrice, o_distributionPr, o_transporPr, o_totalPrnvar, o_vehicle, o_remarks from orders
